title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 16.2 - Scope of regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 16.2 - Scope of regulations

State Regulations

These regulations shall apply to special number plates, but
shall not apply to: (a) number plates
in series reserved in the public interest for purposes of facilitating
identification of State and municipal vehicles and those owned by members of
international governmental organizations; (b) number plates assigned by the commission
for issuance by county clerks; (c) number plates issued for a motor vehicle exempt from the payment of a
registration fee pursuant to subdivision (6) of section
401
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law; or
(d) number plates issued to amateur radio operators pursuant to paragraph (e) of
subdivision (6) of section
401
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
16.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
